BasicInfo.short: NAKIVO enables Cloud Providers, enterprises, and SMBs protect their VMware environments more reliably, efficiently, and cost-effectively.

Products.name: NAKIVO Backup & Replication
Products.description: NAKIVO Backup & Replication for VMware. The fastest growing backup software solution for VMware environments.
